segments.text: Would you like to play golf with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to . but I'm not good at it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter . I will teach you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great ! When will we go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . What should I take ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just take your golf club . I will pick you up Borrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I will wait you at my home .
segments.speaker: S2
